description.narrative: The proposed Project Development Objective (PDO) is to increase productivity and employment in selected value chains in target zones.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Corrective Actions after Mid-Term Review | Description :The Recipient shall, following the Mid-Term Review, actpromptly and diligently in order to take any corrective action deemed necessary to remedy any shortcoming noted in theimplementation of the Project and to implement such other measures as may have been agreed upon with the Association in furtheranceof the objectives of the Project. | Due Date :July 2017

Finance Agreement :Mid-Term Review | Description :The Recipient shall, no later than May 2017 (or such later date as may be agreedupon by the Recipient and the Association), carry out a comprehensive mid-term review of the Project during which it shall exchangeviews with the Association generally on all matters relating to the progress of the Project and the performance by the Recipient ofits obligations under the Financing Agreement.

Finance Agreement :On-The-Job Training | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that throughout implementation of the Project, onthe job training of identified procurement staff involved in the Project has been provided in form and substance acceptable to theAssociation on the World Bank's procurement procedures. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Progress Report | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than forty five (45) days after the reviewdate referred to above (Mid-Term review) prepare under the terms of reference satisfactory to the Association and furnish to theAssociation, for comments, a report, on the progress of theProject, and giving details of the various matters that were discussedat such review. Due Date July 2017.

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of External Auditor | Description :The Recipient shall recruit, no later than three (3) months afterthe Effective Date, an independent external auditor for the Project in accordance with the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2to the Financing Agreement. | Due Date :16-Jan-2014

Finance Agreement :Training to Staff, Filing System for the Project and Procurement Consultant | Description :The Recipient shallensure that training of staff has been provided in form and substance acceptable to IDA on the World Bank's procurement proceduresand data management; a filing system for the Project has been set up in form and substance satisfactory to IDA; and it hasrecruited a procurement consultant to support the FEF Unit with skills, qualifications, experience acceptable to IDA. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Updating of Financial Management Software | Description :The Recipient shall have updated the existing financialmanagement software, no later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, in form and substance acceptable to the Associationand included the procurement system (planning, monitoring and contract management) with thereto. | Due Date :16-Jan-2014
